endpoints.description: Fetch personalized content recommendations for a user based on their preferences and behavior.
Submit or update a user's content preferences for tailored suggestions.
Retrieve a list of currently trending or popular content items on the platform.
Log specific user interactions or behaviors with content to improve recommendation models.
Find and return content items similar to a specified item using advanced similarity algorithms.
List all available content genres to support the user in exploring options within thematic categories.
Modify notification preferences for tailored updates regarding new content releases.
Provide an overview of a user's historical interaction metrics.
Initiate retraining of machine learning models with updated datasets.
Check the operational status and uptime information of the platform infrastructure.
